titleStmt.title: Moravian Lives Personography
titleStmt.principal:
Katherine Mary Faull, Principal Investigator Bucknell University
Lewisburg, Pennsylvania
faull@bucknell.edu

Christer Ahlberger, Principal Investigator, 2015-2018 University of Gothenburg
Gothenburg, Sweden
christer.ahlberger@history.gu.se

sourceDesc.p: List of Moravian Lives person entities with reference to persistent identifiers, using ML standard names

revisionDesc.change: Broke personography into files of 50 entries each. This is first file.
Branched to a Bethlehem personography hold file. Kept Fulneck here.
Updated responsibility list, added more names and fields

event.desc: baptized at St Bartholomew's Church Armley 18 March, 1731 (7 March, 1730 OS). baptized in Church of England
interred at Ockbrook by John Ockershausen
received into childrens' congregation at Marienborn
received into the Great Girls Choir
blessed as a deaconess at Herrnhaag
interred at Fulneck by Samuel Benade

birth.placeName: Barksland in the Parish of Elland

event.desc: received into society/sistersâ house at Cleckheaton
received into congregation at Fulneck 5 April, 1751 (25 March, 1751 OS)

Father died and lived with mother and Betty Midgley
Her mother remarried and she moved in with her aunt

received into the Little Virgins Choir
her class Sisters had a Love-Feast in the sick room
interred at Fulneck by Benjamin La Trobe
received into society at Norwood Green
entered new sisters' house at Fulneck
interred at Fulneck by Benjamin La Trobe

listOccupation.occupation: worked in Childrens Oeconomy Wash Kitchen
